description: This file defines the interface for the CCSP Message Bus Service, including function declarations for message bus engagement, initialization, finalization, resource management, signal sending, and message handling, specifically in an embedded Linux environment.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages or initializes the message bus component with specified component ID, configuration, and path.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes or cleans up the message bus interface with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Performs a check or health verification of the message bus with user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources associated with the message bus, considering priority and user data.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_SendParameterValueChangeSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating a change in parameter value, providing old and new values, and access list.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_SendTransferCompleteSignal
methods.description: Sends a signal indicating transfer completion.

methods.name: CcspPandM_path_message_func
methods.description: Handles messages received over dbus on a specific path, acting as a callback function.

methods.name: ssp_PnmMbi_RegisterToCR
methods.description: Registers the interface with a configuration registry or control mechanism, using a handle and parameter array.
